pages.text: $(l)Plants vs Zombies mod$() added some $(bred)player resources$(), including $(bgreen)TreeLevel$(), $(byellow)SunNum$(), $(bgreen)EnergyNum$() and so on. If you didn't change the config file, you will see 3 strange gui on the corner of the screen in game. They are related to the player resources.

Before explaining them, you should understand $(bgreen)the tree of wisdom$() first. The tree of wisdom is not an common tree, it's invisible and intangible. It is rooted in player's soul and integrated with the player. In the world of PVZ, $(l)the tree of wisdom can help players collect and store resources such as sun and energy and fight side by side with players$().

$(bgreen)Tree Level$(): It is independent of the default mc level, can also be called the PVZ Level.$(br)Usage: The higher the level is, $(byellow)the higher upper limit of SunNum$() and the stronger of some tools.$(br)Display: You must use the $(bred)Almanac$() or command to view.$(br)Upgrade method: player kills zombies or level up plant($(red)Except for the zombies killed by player's plant or zombies not belong to pvzmod$()).

$(byellow)SunNum$(): $(l)The upper limit of SunNum will increase when TreeLevel increases$().$(br)Usage: Using $(bred)Summon Cards$() and some tools will consume SunNum.$(br)Display: The upper left corner of the screen, can also be viewed through the $(bread)Almanac$() or command.$(br)Obtaining method: collide with $(l)Sun$() entity or use $(byellow)Sun Collector$().

$(bgreen)EnergyNum$(): $(l)the upper limit of energy beans can be bought from $(red)Crazy Dave$().$(br)Usage: make plant $(bred)in super mode$() will consume EnergyNum.$(br)Display: The lower left corner of the screen, can also be viewed through the $(bred)Almanac$() or command.$(br)Obtaining method: collide with $(l)Energy$() entity.

$(borange)Money$(): the upper limit is 9999999.$(br)Usage: The general currency of shops, used to purchase some $(bred)Upgrade Plant Cards$() and tools.$(br)Display: The upper left corner of the screen,  can also be viewed through the $(bred)Almanac$() or command.$(br)Obtaining method: collide with $(l)Coin$() entity.

$(bblue)GemNum$(): the upper limit is 9999999.$(br)Usage: The special currency of shops, no use currently.$(br)Display: The upper left corner of the screen, can be viewed through the $(bred)Almanac$() or command.$(br)Obtaining method: collide with $(l)Jewel$() entity.
If you can't see jewel num or money on the upper left coner, please press key(left <- or -> right) to toggle display.
